Ensure you have cleared your browser cookies (you could use an ingognito browser window)
Go to the DOAJ home page

The DOAJ Cookie banner is displayed

Expected Test Results: The Cookie banner disappears and does not reappear on subsequent pages

Action: Hover over Support

Expected Test Results: The dropdown menu appears

Action: Move your mouse away from Support

Expected Test Results: The dropdown menu disappears

Action: Click "Support" at the top

Expected Test Results: You are taken to Support DOAJ page

Action: Go back to the home page
Repeat for the Apply menu
Hover over About

Expected Test Results: The dropdown appears

Action: Move your mouse away from Apply

Expected Test Results: The dropdown menu disappears

Action: Click "About" at the top

Action: Click "About" at the top

Click the orange magnifying glass, top right
